name: 2248 Linked
description:
2248 is an addictive casual core number puzzle and number blast game about connecting the numbers, dots and pops. Connect same numbers in dots vertically and horizontally to win points in this fun free number blast and numbers game. Begin from a base number. Combine it with the same numbers or twice that number. Create longest possible links. Reach the highest tiles and the highest score!
Once started, It is difficult to end! The game is easy to play.
In every move, you must think ahead!

Features:
● Different board sizes for various tastes and difficulty.
● 4x5, 5x7 and 6x8 game boards to play.
● Easy to play, hard to master.
● Special graphic design in this number game.
● Share your scores and dare your friends.
● Leaderboards that allows you compete globally.
● Brain teasers games and brain games for adults.
● Slide the number up, down, left, right in any of the four directions.
● Search and connect the same numbers on the board.
● The game ends when there is no connectable number.
● Adorable fun, and thoughtful game design in this beautiful game about connecting number dots.
● Free to play for life.
● Play offline, without Internet.
● Connect pops and connect crush in this number game.
